review: "Sandra Boynton's 'Going to Bed Book' is a delightful and whimsical bedtime story that captures the essence of a gentle evening routine. The vibrant illustrations and playful text make it a joy to read aloud, and the sturdy board book format ensures it will withstand many bedtime readings. It's a perfect addition to any child's library, bringing a sense of comfort and fun as the day winds down."
